body.name: SYLVOX 15.6 inch Smart TV for Kitchen, 1080P RV TV Under Cabinet TV, Smart Android TV Rotated & Folded, Support Google Assistant WiFi Bluetooth, Small TV for Kitchen, Bedroom, RV Camper, Mahogany
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 6 mins
features: 【15.6” Smart TV】 This smart kitchen TV comes with Android 11.0, built-in Google Assistance and Chromecast, search for movies and shows across thousands of available apps, and easily cast movies, shows, and photos from your Android or iOS device to your kitchen TV.

【1080P FHD Flat Screen TV】 Sylvox RV TV adopts 15.6-inch LED screen with 178° wide viewing angle, 1920*1080 FHD picture quality, HDR technology, 250 nits brightness and 3000:1 contrast ratio to provide clearer images and richer details.

【Under Cabinet Television】 The space-saving design mounts under the cabinets so your countertop won't be cluttered. With timer function, you can set the cooking time. Bring multimedia entertainment into your kitchen with this Kitchen TV, adding more color and vibrancy to your personal cooking space.

【Wide Compatibility】 Small TV for RV camper supports wireless WiFi (2.4G & 5G) and Bluetooth connectivity, equipped with 2 HDMI ports and 2 USB ports, easy access to your favorite devices, compatible with most laptop, smartphone, PC, PS4, speaker and more.

【Mount It Anywhere You Want】 You can install this 15.6" small TV in your kitchen, bedroom nightstand or wardrobe. Comes with a car adapter so you can also take it with you when you travel to watch 1080P Full HDTV in your car, truck or RV.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sylvox 15.6" Kitchen Smart TV If you're starting to feel like your kitchen is boring and monotonous, bring this kitchen TV with multiple entertainment options into your kitchen and instantly turn your kitchen into a smart kitchen that cooks and entertains.

The excellent craftsmanship and compact body fit perfectly into your kitchen design, and the design of the heat dissipation mechanism has also fully considered the special factors of the humid environment in the kitchen, so there is no need to worry about operating the control panel with wet hands.

1080P FHD 1080P Full HD picture quality provides you with a better viewing experience. Google TV All apps for movies, shows, music, sports, and videos are ready to be downloaded from Google Play. Google Assistant Open Google Assistant to search movies, TV, and more. Chromecast Built-in Easily cast movies, shows, and photos from your Android or iOS device onto your kitchen TV.

DC 12V input small TV is not only suitable for the kitchen, but also for the bedroom, RV camper, kid's room, or wherever you need it. The kitchen TV can be easily installed under the cabinet. When the TV screen is folded, the thickness is only 1.42 inches, helping you save space.
Warm Tips: The TV screen can only follow the body to rotate together, can not rotate alone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great TV For The Kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: The high resolution picture quality is great - better than any other under-counter TV we’ve ever had. The screen pivots up into the electronics ‘box’ to keep it out of the way when not using - a nice feature. It also swivels enough to view while sitting at the counter or cooking. Since it’s a ‘smart’ TV, there’s no cable connection if you have WiFi. This really cleans up the space under the cabinets and allows for the use of Netflix, YouTube, etc. The customer service desk was very responsive and helpful at getting me through a couple of small issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good picture easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Great size for kitchen and has USB ports and other nice features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kitchen under cabinet TV
reviews.reviewText: The manual is NOT well written to follow it. I am still trying to figure out how to use the control. I sent them an email and they never responded it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally thought of returning bc my space was not large enough to turn the tv …only stay in one place…it looked so cool and the picture and sound was quality plus I loved the remote mount too…I decided I just had to keep it even tho it was expensive …not having any wires hanging and it clicking up outta sight …it’s a keeper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I paid over 400.00 also paid someone to install it and 2 weeks after return date expires, it stopped working. I turn it on and after 30 seconds it turns off. We have trouble shoot it and still now staying on. I am VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this TV!
reviews.reviewText: This TV has been such a great addition to our laundry room! The sound quality could be better, but I gave it 5 stars because it was so easy to install, picture quality is good and price was great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sound Defective. Remote difficulty.
reviews.reviewText: Sound on this TV is horrible. Had to hook up sound bar to work with TV. Touch Remote is difficult as one has to push buttons repeatedly for it to register.Would not recommend it.Our return window expired before we could get installed so we are out of luck.Also emailed service for replacement remote - service return email not responsive yet.Maybe this one tv is a fluke but buyer beware.9/5/23 Update:The Sylvox Company responded favorably to my complaint. I explained the “tinney” sound and they offered to send out a replacement which they did rather quickly after we talked. The sound on the replacement was much much better. More depth and more color to the sound. The first one was clearly defective. Tau a representative called to inquire if the problem was resolved and I told her it was. They will mail out a paid return label. I was quit surprised by the responsiveness of the company. I naturally changed my rating to 5 stars from original 1 star.I will add that unfortunately with Amazon one can only resort to 1 star rating to call attention to a problem. I’m very comfortable and deeply appreciative of Sylvox’s resolution of our “bad luck” with the initial TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have kitchen TV
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have own several under the kitchen cabinet TV's over the years but I was never satisfied with the picture quality, the look or the fact that they didn't have a HDMI connection. This Sylvox TV satisfied all of my needs. Not only is the picture quality the best I ever had but it also looks good in my kitchen.

This is a must have item for your kitchen. I replaced my 8 year old Adventure with this one because it is actually a smart Tv. No need for HDMI if you have wifi. Streaming made very easy. The only downside is the volume. Although up and down volume works correctly. It has a very tinny sound which is sometimes a little irritating. Pricey but to me, worth it.
